website_summaries.verdict: Very durable product that's perfect for your social events.
pros: Quick and easy to install, will have your beer flowing in no time
High-quality design will provide perfect pours for years to come

customer_reviews.title: Winner chicken dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure after a few pumps, maintained pressure in my keg for over a week... I know, party foul for not finishing the keg immediately, but this tap effectively maintained pressure so I could keep enjoying my keg of craft beer for much longer despite my failures as a person. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about a month before I needed to use it, so I was a little worried that it would work for what I needed. My worries were quickly put to rest once we got the keg. 5 minutes from package to pumping. Very easy to use, seals very nicely, no leaks at all. Much better than the one I was renting from the place I get my keg from. Seller was also very helpful in answering questions during the purchase. Highly recommended, and I will be checking here first for any similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Moser

customer_reviews.title: Great tap, well made, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well and also very well made. The tap is easy to use as well as easy to clean. I definitely appreciate how nice the spring lock works. I've used many in the past that can be a pain to operate. Definitely not the case with this tap.
customer_reviews.author: nb2six

customer_reviews.title: Produces a lot of foam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our wedding(May of 2019). We used a keg and biodegradable cups instead of beer cans and it worked out fine. The only downside was it produced alot of foam, so we have to pump the beer out before the wedding party started so our guests weren’t drinking foam 😂.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frank The Tank!!
customer_reviews.text: These pumps rock! We bought them for our wedding and they worked great! They are pretty hevy duty and now no more deposits on taps. Not that we throw keggers all the time, but it is nice to have them for future events. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas K. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic product, so there's not a lot to say. It's rock solid and does the job. No more tap rental fees and deposits for me. This meets or exceeds the construction quality and functionality of any type I've ever rented. If you regularly treat yourself to a keg, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Stratman351

customer_reviews.title: Keg tap
customer_reviews.text: This is all metal will last . Easy to use , cleaning is simple . Operates very smoothly. It’s an excellent tap for kegs .
customer_reviews.author: Greg Webb

customer_reviews.title: Save your deposit, get your own pump!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, stainless steel. This is the ultimate in keg party pumps. This thing is quality all around. It's long with being too long, so it doesn't take you 100 pumps to get good pressure in the keg. Standard keg nozzle. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Calligan

customer_reviews.title: Surprise, Surprise..
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a cheap made tap for the price. But to my surprise it is pretty strong. I have used for benefit parties over and over. Hundreds of people. It is still holding up. Not even a loose part. Very Nice for the price. Better than renting one every time ! No more $100 deposits !!! Cool !
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBooch

customer_reviews.title: Cheers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 30 year old son him and his buddies seem to really like it! I like it also
customer_reviews.author: M J M

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, bought as a Christmas present for my husband. He loves it, and the added convenience of not having to rent one each time we get a keg.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and strong built
customer_reviews.text: This was used for some intense drinking and it had the perfect pour combined with a strong pump.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS COSTA

customer_reviews.title: Good action, and would meet the needs of most ...
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to be made of high quality materials. Good action, and would meet the needs of most kegs. The product came to us a little dirty (perhaps a demo unit, had fingerprints and smudges), and there was a problem with a leaking nozzle/ spout (most likely a simple adjustment). The latch didn't fully attach to our keg. We decided it was best to return the product, and so far our overall experience with this seller is good!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value with this keg tap
customer_reviews.text: Standard beer keg tap. This product worked perfectly with excellent gasket seals. After a few kegs it quickly paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Well  build
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for left over kegs from my wedding and it worked great! I’ve never “tapped” a keg before and this was super simple. Very well build and comes apart very easy for cleaning. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great tap
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tap. We have a beer system at hunting camp and use the tap as a secondary keg system. Works great, easy to clean and the seals are good so you dont lose any pressure. Well with it and the price is right. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Rooney

customer_reviews.title: pumped two kegs fine
customer_reviews.text: Worked good had little to no issues pumping two full kegs during large outdoor party .
customer_reviews.author: Pistolero

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Tapped my first keg with it and it worked. Do not over pump otherwise it will foam until the pressure drops inside the keg.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Beer Tap That Works
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my wedding it worked like a charm. Easy to assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Socorro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great. identical to the one I rented at the party store.
customer_reviews.author: TJH

customer_reviews.title: Minor problem.
customer_reviews.text: Hose was cracked just behind the nozzle. Hose is already short. Had to cut back hose making it shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Party on Dude!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this pump! easy to clean well made would buy again but it is so well built should not need another. Party on Dude!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Beer Tap
customer_reviews.text: I thought the tap performed very well and was easy to use. It worked well for everyone at our family reunion.
customer_reviews.author: JamesC

customer_reviews.title: works good but the seals are not the best
customer_reviews.text: works good but the seals are not the best, mine lets a little beer come up from the pump handle seal not a big problem just could be better.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: these worked great and were easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Linda Decker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tap worked great we used it along with our jockey box we bought
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I take very good care of my things, but the spigot on this tap broke the first night I used it. The lever constantly falls off...a major party foul. I have used many party pumps and this is easily the cheapest one I have used. Save your money and spring for a nicer tap...I regret not doing the same. The actual pump is fine, so it's a shame they skimped on the cheapest part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: After using the tap a few times, everything has worked great. Seems like a solid product made with good material. It would've been great for this to come with a cleaning kit but, I could've easily purchased that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tap broke 1 hour into its first use. Ruined our party AND wasted a $100 keg.
customer_reviews.author: Willa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine and is heavy duty. Reasonable priced as well. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Great Tap!
customer_reviews.text: Great tap! Easy to use. No issues. Reminded me of my college days.
customer_reviews.author: Mach1

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We've used it twice and so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this. Works well and so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and solid
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you need a solid and simple tap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect for what I needed. Took it out of the package and tapped my keg within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Speichinger

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time and couldn’t have been easier to unbox and put to use. Great value and definitely recommend purchasing this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Kuchem

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: My tap had a hole In it upon arrival. Beer got everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: but worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it for one keg so far, but worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: So FLY

customer_reviews.title: Great Tapper
customer_reviews.text: We've used this at the bar at least 50 times now and still works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Used several times and it's still working as it should. Awesome price. Looks to be quality made. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good product good value
customer_reviews.text: Use this product to serve guests at a wedding and it worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Good pump. Low rating only because the cheap plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Good pump. Low rating only because the cheap plastic nozzle broke after the 3rd beer and wouldn't stop poring out!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Mercado

customer_reviews.title: otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle end defective will no turn off and i don't mean a little ,otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: moewiser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What better time to test it out than during a New Year's Eve party! Worked great and have absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DKee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fast to tap a keg. Very handy to have at a party.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tap has worked well after a week of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It really is heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: The tap was great! I didn't expect it to be heavy duty even tho the reviews claimed it was, but it is every bit heavy duty. My family had a party thanksgiving evening with my daughter and some of her college friends that were home for the holiday. The tap held up great and was even able to handle about 30 keg stands. Pretty impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems to perform as expected in accordance with the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: El Gavilan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean perfect as a backup when the CO2 kicks on the Kegerator!
customer_reviews.author: SouthshoreMA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tap keeps pressure really well and feels really solid ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tap keeps pressure really well and feels really solid however on the other hand the plastic nozzle on the end is junk. Fell apart within an hour of using this product. Had to run to the store and rent a new tap. Bought another nozzle end off amazon and havent had any problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Beer keg Pump
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Beer Keg Pump and got it on a very reasonable price. Its really worth it such a heavy duty and nice pump on real good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anuj K Shahi

customer_reviews.title: Seems really sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. Seems really sturdy so far
customer_reviews.author: Alar

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: this thing is great. solidly built and didn't spray at all when i connected it. it works well to get you drunk.
customer_reviews.author: B. White

customer_reviews.title: Party Saver
customer_reviews.text: After someone stole our tap at the last party, I ordered this and it got here in two days. It may seem expensive but this product was built to last. It comes apart for relatively easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dstanley

customer_reviews.title: Beer Tap
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted. It worked perfectly. My husband put it in a special place, so I know he was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Worked well seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: works like a champ. Reminds me of my college days.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great out of the box; no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great right out of the box. Tapped keg, cold beer flowed and there was much rejoicing. Much better than the cheap all plastic taps the local beer store rents.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M. Matzek

customer_reviews.title: One of Two Broken
customer_reviews.text: One of two pumps didn't work, would recommend buying from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and they have lasted great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these at parties for a few years now, and they have lasted great.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Burch

customer_reviews.title: Oh it flows so nicely
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavty duty tap for a great price. Used heavily through a semester of college and still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Gnatten

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Tip
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tip has came apart on me twice as soon as I got it. Very disappointing. A waste of my money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Young

customer_reviews.title: drips beer from the faucet even when not in use
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this tap once since ordering it, and though it delivered a steady flow of beer with very little head, it wouldn't stop leaking beer as long as the tap was fully in place. It wound up wasting 4-5 cups worth of beer and making quite the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Clinch

customer_reviews.title: Great party keg taps
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! I bought 3 of these for a fall get together we had at our house. They worked well and were simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd time using it
customer_reviews.text: The keg tap looks really nice but unfortunatley, this tap broke on me after only the 2nd time using it. The spicket and pump mechanism both just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty keg pump works well would buy again
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive, works great hope to buy more if business picks up works on all 16 gal kegs best buy around
customer_reviews.author: wicker nowlin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a couple times now. It works fine. The only problem is it doesn't have a clip to hold the hose when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Great Tap
customer_reviews.text: We ordered it for a party, because didn't want to rent a tap. It worked great, we love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shimilou

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Simple to use and works well. Easy to take apart and clean or lube if the O ring gets dry. Good hose length and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Klein

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for a little while!
customer_reviews.text: About halfway through the keg, the tap lost pressure. I had to keep re-tapping it and pumping it constantly to get anything out. Very embarrassing at a party with thirsty people. We couldn't even finish the keg so all that beer was lost. When we first tapped it, it was smooth. I'm especially disappointed because this was to replace one of the taps we regularly use in the backstage VIP section of a large music festival. Now i'm going to have thirsty musicians!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Good luck trying to find a replacement on a Saturday ...
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle didn't work, it kept pouring beer and wouldn't stop. Good luck trying to find a replacement on a Saturday night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lost
customer_reviews.text: needed it quick for a party, and it arrived with time to spare. worked great, would buy again any time.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Worked great just as expected. Seems like it will last a few years versus the lower quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kenia Reyes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Returning. Had to go to liquor store and rent one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great Value for the Money. I've only used it once and it worked pretty much like all keg pumps - but this one seemed to be of better quality than others I've used. If kept clean and protected, I expect it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Agent 19

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my 1/4 keg.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is high quality. Was easy to install on top of the keg and you can adjust the foam out put with the amount of pressure you put in to the keg. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Xan Gallup

customer_reviews.title: tap did not work
customer_reviews.text: the tap would not lock into place, I had to replace the handle with one that would work. This was obviously sold due to a malfunctioning product
customer_reviews.author: Yellowhammer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: A nice tap at a nice price. Much better than the plastic type. No leaks or any other issues, clean up easy.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. no leaks
customer_reviews.text: A little excessive for someone who buys a keg once or twice a year but if your tired of rental taps that leak, its money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have your own tap - it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Werntz

customer_reviews.title: ... with the quality of the tap it's was a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality of the tap it's was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jorge jimenez

customer_reviews.title: This Beer keg tap has worked completely fine for more then a year and a half (after ...
customer_reviews.text: This Beer keg tap has worked completely fine for more then a year and a half (after cleaning it a few times), however I would recommend to potential shoppers to take a look at shorter taps or taps that you can push. Pumping the tap on the keg makes the tap wobble around which gets annoying after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: item was damaged, dirty, and used. beer fell out of the packaging and smelled horrible. The middle of the tap from the inside also looked rusted
customer_reviews.author: Simon Says

customer_reviews.title: Good for a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: It works, but will probably break after a few uses. Go with a more expensive, more reliable tap
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty well made
customer_reviews.text: Decent tap. Wish it had a bleed off valve on the side, but it gets the job done. Pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great and Durable. Im quite satisfied due to its durability and reliability. I recommend it to everyone. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I've already put mine through 5 kegs and ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Works great. I've already put mine through 5 kegs and it hasn't missed a beat. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was an American Keg I needed a British keg doesn't work in Kenya
customer_reviews.author: Gatwechi wa Nyeri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I shwear this taep is teh greaaatest tap evrrr made

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tap, unfortunately, I haven't had the opportunity to use it yet.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The best keg pump I have ever used. Right on time a very happy customer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bev Rite Heavy Duty Complete D-System Beer Party Pump Picnic Keg Tap , 8-Inch
product_meta.description: Heavy duty keg beer party tap Chrome body pump - 8". This beer tap is durable, strong and built to last. Great for parties and other events requiring a keg tap. Will work on most USA domestic beer kegs like Budweiser, Miller, Coors, Molson, Busch, Sam Adams, etc. Lever coupler, lever handle. American Sankey (D system). 8" Chrome plated metal pump. Stainless steel coupler body & nickel plated brass base. Also comes with tube and attached plastic faucet, please see picture.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
